import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bookings', templateUrl: './bookings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bookings.component.css'] }) export class BookingsComponent { isLoading = false bookings: any[] = [] constructor(private http:HttpClient){ this.isLoading = true this.http.get('http://localhost:5100/bookings').subscribe((res) => { this.bookings = res this.isLoading = false }) } }

    Bookings

  • Booking ID: {{ booking._id }}
    User: {{ booking.user }}

    FLIGHT PASSENGERS TOTALPRICE DATE JOURNEYDATE SEATS PAYMENTMETHOD
    {{ booking.flight.flightNumber }}
    • {{ passenger }}
    {{ booking.totalPrice }}
    {{ booking.date | date }}
    {{ booking.journeyDate | date }}
    • {{ seat.seat }}
    {{ booking.paymentMethod }}
